wikipedia_page.main: Brian Edward Girling (born 14 May 1938) is a British former international sports shooter, who competed in an Olympics and four Commonwealth Games from 1966-1990.

Turner represented England and won a gold medal in the 25 metres rapid fire pistol pairs with Brian Girling, at the 1986 Commonwealth Games in Edinburgh, Scotland.
Rolfe represented England and won a bronze medal in the 25 metres rapid fire pistol pairs with Brian Girling, at the 1990 Commonwealth Games in Auckland, New Zealand.
